summary: Adds a standalone follower that can be found inside the bannered mare in whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=century gothic][size=5]STORY[/size]
Here's a story made by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4704425]Wyrmblaze[/url]

There once was a fair maiden named Katherine GoldenHeart, for her name was
not just a name, but the truth, for her heart was the purest of them all. She lived
with her family in the house near the western tower, but then she saw a dragon
coming, so she ran to Whiterun to get help, but then when she came back from
Whiterun...it was too late, her house was completely obliterated, all that was left was
her bed, so she went back to Whiterun, and when she told Hulda (or whatever her name was)
at the Bannered mare, she took pity, and let Katherine stay there for free until she could find
a home.[/font][/center][font=century gothic]

[size=5]BASIC INFO[/size]
Race: Nord
Gender: Female
Age: Unknown
Combat Style: Archer
Favorite Weapon: Bow & Arrow
Body Type: UNP Main
Clothing: Stormcloak Commander Armor
Location: Bannered Mare in Whiterun

[right][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size]
- Skyrim 1.9.32[/right]

[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
NMM or MO:
- download the file
- simply install

MANUAL:
- download main file
- extract files with winRAR
- copy all the files you extracted then paste it in your data folder
- open your SkyrimLauncher or whatever mod manager you are using
- activate the mod
- start skyrim and have fun

[/font][center][font=century gothic][size=5]VIDEO PREVIEW[/size]
[youtube]khNlbZ_ui34[/youtube][/font][/center][font=century gothic]
[/font]
author: Loshirai14
